channel.title: A little insight into command promp
channel.description:
well im bored and my friday night just got f-ed over so im making a tut...
this isnt really supposto teach you how to code your server or anything
but i feel like passing on the info.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- [center][font=Verdana]----the real tut start----[/font][/center] [left]you can use the following for changing file names mainly helpfull for clients/client sprites[/left] challenge.0000001/10 most people can do it but alot of people are noobs...
[b]chapter 1[/b] (there are only 2 chapters) making a .bat file
1. open a notepad 2. click save as renamer.bat 3. to edit a batch file right click and click edit (.bat = batch file)
[b]chapter 2[/b] 1. open the file 2. in every batch file you have to have a title so... [code] title (a name) [/code] i used [code]title my renamer[/code] 3.now since you have to tell it what to do and we are renaming stuff why dont we use "rename" it quite simple... 4. but it has to rename somethig so you have to tell it what to rename so start with an *(astrik) [i]note: the astrik is saying stuff before this point[/i] 5. so *.name 6. and you always end in "pause" 7. so put it all togther and heres what you end up with: [code] title my renamer rename *.jag *.png pause [/code]
so this converts all .jag files to .png files :)
if you just are going to c&p and you havent read the tut just change the .extentions to anything
creds :
me for posting and everyone else that has ever done anything to create computers...

item.title: A little insight into command promp
item.dc:creator: @qw3rty qw3rty
item.description:
@qw3rty wrote:

well im bored and my friday night just got f-ed over so im making a tut…

this isnt really supposto teach you how to code your server or anything

but i feel like passing on the info.

[center][font=Verdana]----the real tut start----[/font][/center]
[left]you can use the following for changing file names mainly helpfull for clients/client sprites[/left]
challenge.0000001/10
most people can do it but alot of people are noobs…

chapter 1 (there are only 2 chapters)
making a .bat file

  1. open a notepad
  2. click save as renamer.bat
  3. to edit a batch file right click and click edit
    (.bat = batch file)

chapter 2

  1. open the file
  2. in every batch file you have to have a title so…
title (a name)

i used

title my renamer

3.now since you have to tell it what to do and we are renaming stuff why dont we use “rename” it quite simple…
4. but it has to rename somethig so you have to tell it what to rename so start with an *(astrik)
note: the astrik is saying stuff before this point
5. so *.name
6. and you always end in “pause”
7. so put it all togther and heres what you end up with:

title my renamer
rename *.jag *.png
pause

so this converts all .jag files to .png files 

if you just are going to c&p and you havent read the tut just change the .extentions to anything

creds :

me for posting and everyone else that has ever done anything to create computers…

Read full topic
item.source: A little insight into command promp
